DOC.brief_summary: Bioresonance is the big promise of the medical technology of the future because it stimulates the self-regenerating system of the body by affecting the body`s most essential procedures. The big advantage is that its multiple and there are no harmful side effects. This therapy teaches something to the body what in a younger and healthier state it had already Bioresonance is based on the scientific principle that metabolism within cells is influenced by one's electromagnetic field. We start to use bioresonance technology in management of erectile dysfunction , premature ejaculation, decreased libido.
DOC.brief_title: Management of Sexual Dysfunction With Bioresonance Technique
DOC.criteria: erectile dysfunction Premature ejaculation Decreased libido
